sentence.Network_en: The paper studied ferment condition of Claviceps paspali to producing ergot alkali.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究了雀稗麦角菌产麦角碱发酵条件.

sentence.Network_en: This paper is a study of culture medium of Claviceps Paspali for ergot alkali fermentation.
sentence.Network_cn: 对产麦角碱雀稗麦角菌的发酵培养基进行了研究.

sentence.Network_en: Infection of grains by the ascomycete claviceps purpura causes ergotism, a toxic condition.
sentence.Network_cn: 谷物被子串菌纲麦角菌污染后,导致麦角中毒, 一种中毒症状.
